name: v-create
caption: V-create

effect.short: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Lowers the user's [Defense]{mechanic:defense}, [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense}, and [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage} each.

flavorText:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself
at its target. This lowers the userâ€™s Defense, Sp. Def,
